content:
Hey! 👋 I’m a CSE student from Bangladesh, into cybersecurity, exploring stuff like bug hunting, CTFs, and learning through hands-on projects.
🔐 I spend time figuring out how things break (and how to fix them), sometimes with friends, sometimes solo.
🔧 I mess around with things like Raspberry Pi, set up honeypots, and just enjoy experimenting whenever I get the chance.
That’s me—curious, always learning, and trying to make the most out of this tech journey.
Explore My Work # ✍️ Write-ups: Detailed explanations of challenges and solutions I’ve tackled.
Contact Me # 📧 Email: cyberwizard963@gmail.com 💬 Always happy to connect—let’s discuss ideas, opportunities, or cybersecurity in general! """
summary: Hey! 👋 I’m a CSE student from Bangladesh, into cybersecurity, exploring stuff like bug hunting, CTFs, and learning through hands-on projects.

title: Power Up

content:
🛡️ Independent Security Researcher # 2023 – Present
Performed red teaming and web security assessments on various platforms.
🚩 CTF Competitor — Federal Bonk Investigations Team
2023 – Present
🥇 1st Place — IUT CTF 2024
🥇 1st Place — Flag Fest Qualifier 2024
🏅 8th Place — DIU Final CTF
🏁 Finalist — Cyber Raid & BUET CTF\
🧠 Specialized in Digital Forensics, Networking and steganography, known for unique problem-solving and team leadership in live-fire environments.
🎤 Security Conference Participant Actively involved in the cybersecurity community — attending, speaking at, and learning from various national and international security conferences to stay ahead of the curve.
🚀 Startup # Co-Founder — SwiftHype
Feb 2025 – Present
Co-founded a premium digital agency offering:
🌍 Community # Vice President — MUPI Computer Club
2024 – Present
Built the club from scratch, growing it to 550+ members.
Organized tech sessions and workshops on programming & cybersecurity.
CTF Mentor & Challenge Creator
Teach stego & crypto to beginners.
Created hands-on CTFs for club and college events.
Rover Team Member — Munshiganj Polytechnic Institute
2023 – Present
Represented the institute in scouting and technical activities through the Rover program, promoting leadership and discipline.
